item.title: Monstress
item.description: “Monstress” by Marjorie Liu. Credits: imagecomics.com Plot Points [Maika] Go on, all of you. RAGE. Madness just struck your friends and loved ones, and probably had to kill them to survive. But none of you can deal with that, can you? You’d rather blame someone else, instead of feeling your grief. You’d rather keep killing instead of remembering. You’re murderers. But worse, you are cowards.
